6048.verse: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ|And the heaven|125|210|16112$وَمَا|and He Who|100|270|46$بَنَـٰهَا|constructed it,|119|204|17821$

6049.verse: وَٱلْأَرْضِ|And the earth|112|209|352$وَمَا|and He Who|100|294|46$طَحَـٰهَا|spread it,|84|181|18170$

6051.verse: فَأَلْهَمَهَا|And He inspired it|136|165|18173$فُجُورَهَا|(to understand) what is wrong for it|260|318|18174$وَتَقْوَٮٰهَا|and what is right for it,|174|203|18175$

6055.verse: إِذِ|When|57|129|5836$ٱنۢبَعَثَ|(was) sent forth|129|272|18179$أَشْقَـٰهَا|(the) most wicked of them.|202|274|18180$

6056.verse: فَقَالَ|But said|73|85|332$لَهُمْ|to them|72|96|98$رَسُولُ|(the) Messenger|129|153|6924$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|110|606$نَاقَةَ|`(It is the) she-camel|166|190|18181$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|93|606$وَسُقْيَـٰهَا|and her drink.`|119|119|18182$

6057.verse: فَكَذَّبُوهُ|But they denied him,|157|172|6500$فَعَقَرُوهَا|and they hamstrung her.|184|213|8586$فَدَمْدَمَ|So destroyed|108|137|18183$عَلَيْهِمْ|them|76|105|22$رَبُّهُم|their Lord|83|98|3627$بِذَنۢبِهِمْ|for their sin|96|316|17121$فَسَوَّٮٰهَا|and leveled them.|138|358|17823$

6061.verse: وَمَا خَلَقَ|And He Who created|157|239|18185$ٱلذَّكَرَ|the male|77|240|16301$وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ|and the female,|124|206|1547$

6065.verse: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ|Then We will ease him|167|350|18188$لِلْيُسْرَىٰ|towards [the] ease.|153|336|18049$

6066.verse: وَأَمَّا|But as for|85|112|269$مَنۢ|(him) who|86|141|76$بَخِلَ|withholds|82|137|18189$وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ|and considers himself free from need,|268|295|18190$

6068.verse: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ|Then We will ease him|167|332|18188$لِلْعُسْرَىٰ|towards [the] difficulty.|179|344|18191$

6071.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|138|713$لَنَا|for Us|59|139|338$لَلْأَخِرَةَ|(is) the Hereafter|136|216|18194$وَٱلْأُولَىٰ|and the first (life).|143|183|16270$

6072.verse: fa>an*arotukumo⚓So I warn you⚓V|PERF|(IV)|LEM:>an*ara|ROOT:n*r|1S★naArFA⚓(of) a Fire⚓ N|LEM:naAr|ROOT:nwr|F|INDEF|ACC★talaZ~aY`⚓blazing,⚓ V|IMPF|LEM:talaZ~aY`|ROOT:lZy|3FS★

6044.verse: By the sun and its brightness

6045.verse: And [by] the moon when it follows it

6046.verse: And [by] the day when it displays it

6047.verse: And [by] the night when it covers it

6048.verse: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

6049.verse: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

6050.verse: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

6051.verse: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

6052.verse: He has succeeded who purifies it,

6053.verse: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

6054.verse: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

6055.verse: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

6056.verse: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."

6057.verse: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

6058.verse: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.

6059.verse: By the night when it covers

6060.verse: And [by] the day when it appears

6061.verse: And [by] He who created the male and female,

6063.verse: As for he who gives and fears Allah

6065.verse: We will ease him toward ease.

6066.verse: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

6068.verse: We will ease him toward difficulty.

6069.verse: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?

6071.verse: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

6072.verse: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
